edu.rit.pjmr

Class TextFileSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pjmr.TextFileSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable, Source<TextId,String>

    public class TextFileSource
extends Object
implements Source<TextId,String>
    Class TextFileSource provides a data source that obtains data records from a file. The file is assumed to contain plain text. Each line of the file constitutes one data record. The data record ID consists of the file and the line number (type TextId). The data record contents is the line itself (type String).

    Note: Class TextFileSource is multiple thread safe.

    • Constructor Summary

      Construct a new text file source that will read the given file name.

      • next

        public Pair<TextId,String> next(int id)
                         throws IOException
        Get the next data record from this data source. The data record is being requested by the mapper with the given ID. The data record is a Pair containing a data record ID and the data record contents.
        Specified by:
        next in interface Source<TextId,String>
        Parameters:
        id - Mapper ID (ignored).
        Returns:
        Data record, or null if there are no more.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurred.
